data.text:
Very nice hotel with a sandy beach and its own reef, good diving school.
Lots of swimming pools and a water park
Delicious cuisine - Italian, Asian, many different desserts.
Beautiful views, especially from the Cytadela restaurant.
Beautiful gardens
Most importantly, very helpful staff - everywhere - in the restaurant, in bars, by the pools, on the beach, cleaning staff, as well as at the reception - there was no problem with extending the stay due to a late departure
The animators are very nice, but the animations are mainly for Italians
The only minus is the lack of wi-fi in the rooms
 Great vacation
data.title: Great vacation

data.text: Another beautiful trip to our favourite place in Sharm. You cannot fault this hotel. The location is perfect, especially for some of the best snorkeling in Sharm. The restaurants are all incredible, with a vast selection of dishes, especially the Maharaja A la Carte where we had one of the best meals we have ever had and were looked after incredibly well by Mohamhed who couldn't do enough for us. The staff at all of the pool bars are very attentive and cater to your every need. A special mention for Ahmed and Gamal in the main Piazza Bar who looked after us for the week we were there making sure we were never without refreshments, and also to Mr. Mahmoud who is always walking around and checking in with guests to make sure they have everything they might want or need. This was our third stay at Reef and each one is better than the last, we wouldn't stay anywhere else in Sharm.
data.title: Another fantastic stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests,

Thank you for taking the time to express your feedback about your stay with us.

We do appreciate hearing from our guest, as their comments are vital for us to continue improving our service.

With warm regards,

Yasser Azab
General Manager
owner_response.author: Yasser Azab

data.text: Amazing resort especially the entertainment. The animation team created a fun, vibrant and exhilarating environment with loads of activities involving the guests, felt like part of the family and looked forward to all evening entertainment ❤️ Definitely would recommend.
data.title: Great experience

data.text:
Just spent three weeks at this hotel and had a great time. Mainly due to the wonderful staff who can’t do enough for you! 
A special mention to Khalid the room boy who made our stay extra special. The gardens are absolutely stunning so don’t forget to take a walk around them. 
Take advantage of the al a carte restaurants. More than enough sun beds on the beach with wonderful staff, especially Yasey the life guard, the boat man and Mido the barber. 
 I’m sure we shall we return.
data.title: A Great Stay

data.text:
The name of the hotel corresponds exactly. An amazing coral reef, an oasis of well-being in a well-kept garden with pools, bars, ..., a sandy beach.
Last year we visited this hotel twice and on Saturday we fly again, this time for the twelfth time. Everything was great as usual. Here I must remind again the great staff of the hotel, I will mention at least Mr. Nabil and his colleagues in the restaurant. Also, Mr. Beshoy makes the best cocktails in the pub and sports bar. Unfortunately, I cannot name all the hotel employees here, but they are the biggest asset of the hotel and thanks to them, the stay at this hotel is the best. We are already looking forward to next week.
The only thing that is a bit of a problem now is to get from our country (Czech Republic) simply by direct flight to Sharm el Sheikh. Nothing flies directly from the Czech Republic. Two years ago we flew twice with Enter Air from Katowice (Poland), and last year twice with Wizzair from Vienna (Austria). We will now fly with Wizzair from Budapest (Hungary) but after all that is already quite far for us.. I hope we can find some flight option for our next stays at Reef Oasis Beach as well.
data.title: Reef Oasis Beach hotel is truly a reef and an oasis and a beach
